attributes.action: Withdraw the State Visit Invitation from Donald Trump
attributes.additional_details:
As President of the United States, Donald Trump is due to visit the UK on a state visit this year. 
We believe that the United Kingdom, a country defined by its tolerance and acceptance of all, regardless of their religion, sexuality or ethnicity, should not invite a man who is so rigorously and doggedly against these values. 
We call on the UK Government to withdraw Donald's Trump invitation to visit our shores.
attributes.background: Donald Trump is due to come to the U.K. on a state visit in 2017. His values and beliefs are at such great odds to ours we call on the government to withdraw his state visit invitation.
